mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CAR_BOOK_SCHD ( CAR_NUM, CAR_DRVR, CAR_PSGR, DEST, USE_PRPS, SBMT_NAME, STRT_DT, STRT_TMCD, END_DT, END_TMCD, RMRK, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{carNumber}, #{driver}, #{passengers}, #{destination}, #{usePropose}, #{submitter}, #{startDate}, #{startTimeCd}, #{endDate}, #{endTimeCd}, #{rmrk}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO TH_CAR_BOOK ( BOOK_ID, CAR_NUM, DRIV_YN, CAR_DRVR, CAR_PSGR, DEST, USE_PRPS, SBMT_NAME, STRT_DT, STRT_TMCD, END_DT, END_TMCD, INPT_PARK_LOC, RMRK, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{BOOK_ID}, #{CAR_NUM}, #{DRIV_YN}, #{CAR_DRVR}, #{CAR_PSGR}, #{DEST}, #{USE_PRPS}, #{SBMT_NAME}, #{STRT_DT}, #{STRT_TMCD}, #{END_DT}, #{END_TMCD}, IF(DRIV_YN = 'Y', #{PARK_LOC}, null), #{RMRK}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PARK_LOC SET PARK_LOC = #{PARK_LOC}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE CAR_NUM = #{CAR_NUM}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.BOOK_ID, A.CAR_NUM, A.CAR_DRVR, A.CAR_PSGR, A.DEST, A.SBMT_NAME, A.USE_PRPS, A.STRT_DT, A.STRT_TMCD, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.STRT_TMCD) AS STRT_TM, A.END_DT, A.END_TMCD, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.END_TMCD) AS END_TM, IF( CASE A.END_TMCD WHEN 'TDC1' THEN SYSDATE() < DATE_ADD(A.END_DT, INTERVAL 14 HOUR) ELSE SYSDATE() < DATE_ADD(A.END_DT, INTERVAL 23*60 + 59 MINUTE) END, 'N', 'Y' ) AS RQIR_INPT_PARK_LOC, A.RMRK, B.CAR_MODL, B.FUEL_TYPE_CD, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = B.FUEL_TYPE_CD) AS FUEL_TYPE, C.PARK_LOC, NVL((SELECT SBMT_NAME FROM TH_CAR_BOOK WHERE CAR_NUM = A.CAR_NUM AND END_DT = (SELECT MAX(END_DT) FROM th_car_book WHERE CAR_NUM = A.CAR_NUM) AND DRIV_YN = 'Y'), '') AS RCNT_USER FROM TB_CAR_BOOK_SCHD A LEFT JOIN TB_CAR B ON A.CAR_NUM = B.CAR_NUM LEFT JOIN TB_PARK_LOC C ON A.CAR_NUM = C.CAR_NUM WHERE 1=1
AND A.SBMT_NAME = #{userId}
AND ( A.CAR_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.CAR_MODL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR A.CAR_DRVR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY A.END_DT, A.END_TMCD, A.BOOK_ID DESC

SELECT A.BOOK_ID, IF(A.DRIV_YN='Y', '운행', '미운행/취소') AS DRIV_YN, A.CAR_NUM, A.CAR_DRVR, A.CAR_PSGR, A.DEST, A.USE_PRPS, A.STRT_DT, A.STRT_TMCD, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.STRT_TMCD) AS STRT_TM, A.END_DT, A.END_TMCD, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.END_TMCD) AS END_TM, NVL(A.INPT_PARK_LOC, '') AS INPT_PARK_LOC, B.CAR_MODL, A.RMRK FROM TH_CAR_BOOK A LEFT JOIN TB_CAR B ON A.CAR_NUM = B.CAR_NUM WHERE 1=1
AND A.SBMT_NAME = #{userId}
AND ( A.CAR_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.CAR_MODL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR A.CAR_DRVR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY A.END_DT DESC, A.END_TMCD DESC, A.BOOK_ID DESC

SELECT BOOK_ID, CAR_NUM, CAR_DRVR, CAR_PSGR, DEST, USE_PRPS, SBMT_NAME, STRT_DT, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = STRT_TMCD) AS STRT_TM, STRT_TMCD, END_DT, (SELECT COMM_CD_NAME FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = END_TMCD) AS END_TM, END_TMCD, RMRK, STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H%i%s') AS REG_DT FROM TB_CAR_BOOK_SCHD WHERE 1=1
AND CAR_NUM = #{carNumber}
AND CASE END_TMCD WHEN 'TDC1' THEN SYSDATE() > DATE_ADD(END_DT, INTERVAL 14 HOUR) ELSE SYSDATE() > DATE_ADD(END_DT, INTERVAL 23*60 + 59 MINUTE) END
AND ( CAR_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR SBMT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR DEST LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CAR_BOOK_SCHD SET CAR_DRVR = #{CAR_DRVR}, CAR_PSGR = #{CAR_PSGR}, DEST = #{DEST}, USE_PRPS = #{USE_PRPS}, RMRK = #{RMRK}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE BOOK_ID = #{BOOK_ID}
